Gi.content: is it true that, acc. Heidegger, there’s no sexual difference in man— which is to say in woman?
Gi.linkedContent: is it true that, acc. Heidegger, there’s no sexual difference in man— which is to say in woman?

Gi.content: insofar as it is open to the question of Being, Dasein would not be sexiferous (sexifère) [?] [see p. 10]
Gi.linkedContent: insofar as it is open to the question of Being, Dasein would not be sexiferous (sexifère) [?] [see p. 10]

Gi.content: for Heidegger, sexual difference did not rise to height of ontological difference? > ontic predicate
Gi.linkedContent: for Heidegger, sexual difference did not rise to height of ontological difference? > ontic predicate

Gi.content: will not be a question of heights, thinking difference not up to it [in contrast to Nietzsche?]
Gi.linkedContent: will not be a question of heights, thinking difference not up to it [in contrast to Nietzsche?]

Gi.content: sexual difference has become the Kampfplatz of ethics & politics (haughty of Heidegger to say nothing?)
Gi.linkedContent: sexual difference has become the Kampfplatz of ethics & politics (haughty of Heidegger to say nothing?)

Gi.content: one must invoke chance, aléa, destin before predicting (prédire) anything about “sexuality”
Gi.linkedContent: one must invoke chance, aléa, destin before predicting (prédire) anything about “sexuality”

Gi.content: the trace of Heidegger’s silence on sexuality doesn’t come from just anywhere, but Derrida won’t pin it down w/ a name (omission, foreclosure, unthought, repression, denial)
Gi.linkedContent: the trace of Heidegger’s silence on sexuality doesn’t come from just anywhere, but Derrida won’t pin it down w/ a name (omission, foreclosure, unthought, repression, denial)

Gi.content: Dasein’s neutrality as a certain sexlessness (Geschlechtsoloigkeit), sexual difference privileged anthropological trait to be neutralized; Heidegger: “Dasein is neither of the two sexes”
Gi.linkedContent: Dasein’s neutrality as a certain sexlessness (Geschlechtsoloigkeit), sexual difference privileged anthropological trait to be neutralized; Heidegger: “Dasein is neither of the two sexes”

Gi.content: belonging to “two sexes” as first ontic concretion
Gi.linkedContent: belonging to “two sexes” as first ontic concretion

Gi.content: re: Dasein, the precipitation or acceleration to neutralize man’s sexuality, and to do so first, cannot be neutral
Gi.linkedContent: re: Dasein, the precipitation or acceleration to neutralize man’s sexuality, and to do so first, cannot be neutral

Gi.content: sexless neutrality of Dasein does not desexualize, there’s a potency, a positivity > it’s the binarity (sexual duality) that’s neutralized in Dasein’s Geschlechtslosigkeit (sexlessness)
Gi.linkedContent: sexless neutrality of Dasein does not desexualize, there’s a potency, a positivity > it’s the binarity (sexual duality) that’s neutralized in Dasein’s Geschlechtslosigkeit (sexlessness)

Gi.content: pre-differential, or rather pre-dual, sexuality > not necessarily homogenous, undifferentiated
Gi.linkedContent: pre-differential, or rather pre-dual, sexuality > not necessarily homogenous, undifferentiated

Gi.content: neutralization, at once effect of negativity [sexual division into 2] and the erasure to which thinking submits this negativity so originary positivity can appear
Gi.linkedContent: neutralization, at once effect of negativity [sexual division into 2] and the erasure to which thinking submits this negativity so originary positivity can appear

Gi.content: sexual difference as the 2, a negativity, even an asexuality > (is this interpretation, Derrida asks, too violent?)
Gi.linkedContent: sexual difference as the 2, a negativity, even an asexuality > (is this interpretation, Derrida asks, too violent?)

Gi.content: have we ever though sexuality outside wisdom, knowledge, metaphysics, philosophy of life, existence?
Gi.linkedContent: have we ever though sexuality outside wisdom, knowledge, metaphysics, philosophy of life, existence?

Gi.content: if sexuality must be neutralized, why insist?
Gi.linkedContent: if sexuality must be neutralized, why insist?

Gi.content: what if “sexuality” marked most originary Selbstheit?
Gi.linkedContent: what if “sexuality” marked most originary Selbstheit?

Gi.content: what if neutralization (which doesn’t happen all by itself) were a violent operation?
Gi.linkedContent: what if neutralization (which doesn’t happen all by itself) were a violent operation?

Gi.content: maybe une autre sexe, another Geschlecht, would inscribe itself in ipseity
Gi.linkedContent: maybe une autre sexe, another Geschlecht, would inscribe itself in ipseity

Gi.content: “transcendental dispersion” belongs to essence of Dasein in its neutrality
Gi.linkedContent: “transcendental dispersion” belongs to essence of Dasein in its neutrality

Gi.content: Dasein must have body, bodiliness, prior to sexuality? Leiblichkeit draws Dasein into dispersion, thus into sexual difference? [see Gii pp. 38-9 Dasein as Leib]
Gi.linkedContent: Dasein must have body, bodiliness, prior to sexuality? Leiblichkeit draws Dasein into dispersion, thus into sexual difference? [see Gii pp. 38-9 Dasein as Leib]

Gi.content: translation problems not accidental or secondary, thinking of Geschlecht same as translation: French dis- translates (by means of transfer/displacement) German zer- (dissociation, distraction, dissemination, division, dispersion, Zerstreuung, Zerstreutheit, Zerstörung, Zersplitterung, Zerspaltung)
Gi.linkedContent: translation problems not accidental or secondary, thinking of Geschlecht same as translation: French dis- translates (by means of transfer/displacement) German zer- (dissociation, distraction, dissemination, division, dispersion, Zerstreuung, Zerstreutheit, Zerstörung, Zersplitterung, Zerspaltung)

Gi.content: inner supplementary frontier splits lexicon again: both dis- and zer- have neutral, nonnegative sense
Gi.linkedContent: inner supplementary frontier splits lexicon again: both dis- and zer- have neutral, nonnegative sense

Gi.content: Geschlecht as inscription, stroke, imprint [Schlag]
Gi.linkedContent: Geschlecht as inscription, stroke, imprint [Schlag]

Gi.content: for Heidegger, no properly sexual predicate > none that doesn’t refer back to general structure of Dasein: inside/outside, dispersion & proximity, here & there, birth & death…
Gi.linkedContent: for Heidegger, no properly sexual predicate > none that doesn’t refer back to general structure of Dasein: inside/outside, dispersion & proximity, here & there, birth & death…

Gi.content: sexual connotations can mark discourse, jusqu’à l’envahir, to the extent that they are homogenous w/ what every discourse implies
Gi.linkedContent: sexual connotations can mark discourse, jusqu’à l’envahir, to the extent that they are homogenous w/ what every discourse implies

Gi.content: sexual difference not yet sexual duality? not yet, no longer, sealed by the 2? > “not yet” and “no longer” imply a submission to “the control and inspection of reason (quelque arraisonnement)”
Gi.linkedContent: sexual difference not yet sexual duality? not yet, no longer, sealed by the 2? > “not yet” and “no longer” imply a submission to “the control and inspection of reason (quelque arraisonnement)”

Gi.content: how did difference get deposited in the 2?
Gi.linkedContent: how did difference get deposited in the 2?

Gi.content: if one insists in consigning difference to dual opposition, how did multiplication get arrested in difference? in sexual difference?
Gi.linkedContent: if one insists in consigning difference to dual opposition, how did multiplication get arrested in difference? in sexual difference?

Gii.content: Geschlecht as idiom, a “we” that can hear Fichte’s address (not necessarily the Germans)
Gii.linkedContent: Geschlecht as idiom, a “we” that can hear Fichte’s address (not necessarily the Germans)

Gii.content: organic community in nonnatural, spiritual sense
“we” announces itself to itself from infinity of a telos of freedom/spirituality > engages, allies, promises itself acc. circle of this infinite will
Gii.linkedContent: “we” announces itself to itself from infinity of a telos of freedom/spirituality > engages, allies, promises itself acc. circle of this infinite will

Gii.content: Geschlecht, in Fichte, is/inhabits living language of inspirited breath vs. dead language torn from its root
Gii.linkedContent: Geschlecht, in Fichte, is/inhabits living language of inspirited breath vs. dead language torn from its root

Gii.content: acc. Fichte, children learn language as if signs for sensible things were arbitrary (willkürlich) > must reconstitute past development of national language
Gii.linkedContent: acc. Fichte, children learn language as if signs for sensible things were arbitrary (willkürlich) > must reconstitute past development of national language

Gii.content: for Fichte, “we” of Geschlecht, question of humanity (Menschlichkeit) (versus animality) > teleological essence of humanity announced par excellence in Deutschheit
Gii.linkedContent: for Fichte, “we” of Geschlecht, question of humanity (Menschlichkeit) (versus animality) > teleological essence of humanity announced par excellence in Deutschheit

Gii.content: hand or gift > is this the site of sexual desire (Geschlecht in sexual difference)?
Gii.linkedContent: hand or gift > is this the site of sexual desire (Geschlecht in sexual difference)?

Gii.content: Heidegger’s hand: holds, carries, welcomes, signs—presumably because man is a sign > (does Phenomenology of Spirit say anything different?)
Gii.linkedContent: Heidegger’s hand: holds, carries, welcomes, signs—presumably because man is a sign > (does Phenomenology of Spirit say anything different?)

Gii.content: thinking of the hand, hand of thinking > thinking of human Geschlecht (not a humanism? or not a metaphysical, classical humanism?)
Gii.linkedContent: thinking of the hand, hand of thinking > thinking of human Geschlecht (not a humanism? or not a metaphysical, classical humanism?)

Gii.content: w/ respect to Heidegger’s hand, does one make love w/ a hand or hands? Derrida imagines Heidegger’s protest: the hand that gives itself, promises, engages in oath already tells you everything about loving, caressing, desiring——“perhaps, but why not say it then?”
Gii.linkedContent: w/ respect to Heidegger’s hand, does one make love w/ a hand or hands? Derrida imagines Heidegger’s protest: the hand that gives itself, promises, engages in oath already tells you everything about loving, caressing, desiring——“perhaps, but why not say it then?”

Gii.content: concern ourselves w/ Geschlecht of Geschlecht: a mark (de)composed, perhaps no longer a word, follow its translations, decomposition, disarticulatons, genealogy of its body unified on basis of or acc. the split (partage) of pieces of words > Geschlecht’s genealogical composition inseparable from decomposition of human Geschlecht
Gii.linkedContent: concern ourselves w/ Geschlecht of Geschlecht: a mark (de)composed, perhaps no longer a word, follow its translations, decomposition, disarticulatons, genealogy of its body unified on basis of or acc. the split (partage) of pieces of words > Geschlecht’s genealogical composition inseparable from decomposition of human Geschlecht

Gii.content: Schlag (blow, also race/species in figurative sense) & Geschlecht > Heidegger: our language calls the humanity that has received imprint of striking, or cast in this striking (Schlag), Geschlecht ——das Zwiefache, double, dual duplicitous fold of sexual difference
Gii.linkedContent: Schlag (blow, also race/species in figurative sense) & Geschlecht > Heidegger: our language calls the humanity that has received imprint of striking, or cast in this striking (Schlag), Geschlecht ——das Zwiefache, double, dual duplicitous fold of sexual difference

Gii.content: die Zwietracht der Geschlechter, duality of sexes as dissension, war, disagreement
Gii.linkedContent: die Zwietracht der Geschlechter, duality of sexes as dissension, war, disagreement

Gii.content: [meanings of Geschlecht and Schlag (i.e. imprint of a coin)]
Gii.linkedContent: [meanings of Geschlecht and Schlag (i.e. imprint of a coin)]

Gii.content: the “situation (Erörterung)” of Gedicht needs recourse to idiom of Geschlecht (Geschlecht of idiom)? how to think Gedicht’s belonging, appropriation to a language, to a Geschlecht
Gii.linkedContent: the “situation (Erörterung)” of Gedicht needs recourse to idiom of Geschlecht (Geschlecht of idiom)? how to think Gedicht’s belonging, appropriation to a language, to a Geschlecht

Gii.content: savage second blow of sexual difference, its Verwesung, vs. originary, tender sexual difference > Heidegger claims this schema is not Christian/Platonic, but it has no other content and even no other language than Platonism/Christianity > its archi-matinal origin, ultra-Western horizon, constituted by hollow of a repetition, same for Verfall, Ruf, Sorge in structure of Dasein
Gii.linkedContent: savage second blow of sexual difference, its Verwesung, vs. originary, tender sexual difference > Heidegger claims this schema is not Christian/Platonic, but it has no other content and even no other language than Platonism/Christianity > its archi-matinal origin, ultra-Western horizon, constituted by hollow of a repetition, same for Verfall, Ruf, Sorge in structure of Dasein

EL.content: Geschlecht and Schlag (stamp, imprint) > “we” that undergoes relation to itself out of (depuis) menacing interpellation of Geschlecht by apocalyptic speech (parole)
EL.linkedContent: Geschlecht and Schlag (stamp, imprint) > “we” that undergoes relation to itself out of (depuis) menacing interpellation of Geschlecht by apocalyptic speech (parole)

ATAP.content: death, another apocalypse—whoever speaks apocalyptically: truth of truth, truth as end, Last Judgment, seduces w/ unbearable pure differential vibration (the 1st)
ATAP.linkedContent: death, another apocalypse—whoever speaks apocalyptically: truth of truth, truth as end, Last Judgment, seduces w/ unbearable pure differential vibration (the 1st)

ATAP.content: this death sentence, cet arrêt de mort, can only judge us, those who don’t know this secret are already dead, so… let’s make a sect, sex, gender, race (Geschlecht) by ourselves [Babel scene] > we are the only ones in the world
ATAP.linkedContent: this death sentence, cet arrêt de mort, can only judge us, those who don’t know this secret are already dead, so… let’s make a sect, sex, gender, race (Geschlecht) by ourselves [Babel scene] > we are the only ones in the world

EU.content: for Schelling, those whose thought isn’t regulated by living and buzzing communion w/ divine [w/ community] are like sexless bees (geschlechtslose Bienen) > depositing inorganic excrement outside hive—proof of their platitudes
EU.linkedContent: for Schelling, those whose thought isn’t regulated by living and buzzing communion w/ divine [w/ community] are like sexless bees (geschlechtslose Bienen) > depositing inorganic excrement outside hive—proof of their platitudes

WBH.content: gift beyond sexual duality > Heidegger’s attempt to neutralize sexual opposition and not sexual difference, liberating field of sexuality for very different sexuality, more multiple: no more sexes, one sex for each time, each gift, a sexual difference for each gift
WBH.linkedContent: gift beyond sexual duality > Heidegger’s attempt to neutralize sexual opposition and not sexual difference, liberating field of sexuality for very different sexuality, more multiple: no more sexes, one sex for each time, each gift, a sexual difference for each gift

CHOR.content: Heidegger insists that Dasein is neuter, it is neutral, neither of the 2 sexes, but not indifferent, not annulling negativity—an originary positivity, Mächtigkeit des Wesens
CHOR.linkedContent: Heidegger insists that Dasein is neuter, it is neutral, neither of the 2 sexes, but not indifferent, not annulling negativity—an originary positivity, Mächtigkeit des Wesens

CHOR.content: very obscure area, passage btwn ontological difference & sexual difference not punctuated by polarities (originary/derived, ontological/ontic…)
CHOR.linkedContent: very obscure area, passage btwn ontological difference & sexual difference not punctuated by polarities (originary/derived, ontological/ontic…)
